title: Karaoke Revolution Glee:  Volume 3
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Spanish.  Get ready to ’gleek out’ like never before with the McKinley High GLEE Club in Karaoke Revolution Glee:  Volume 3!  The hit franchise returns with the largest lineup of all-new show hits and music performances to date. Karaoke Revolution Glee: Volume 3 boasts up to 35 chart-topping tunes, filled with the show’s main characters and show-stopping performances from Season 2!  Put yourself at center stage and experience the GLEE phenomenon this Holiday 2011. Microphone required.

childDownloads.title: And I Am Telling You I Am Not Going
childDownloads.description: (Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB)  Download an all-new Karaoke Revolution Glee song track!  Your purchase includes “And I Am Telling You I Am Not Going” from the TV show, GLEE.  Extend your GLEE experience with more music and memorable performances!  You must own the Karaoke Revolution Glee: Volume 3 game disc to play this song track.  For more information on Xbox LIVE, please visit www.xbox.com/live/accounts.  For more information about the game, please visit www.konami.com.)
